lead_paragraph: To-day has been a great day in the annals of Ohio industry. The second Annual State Fair opened in this City yesterday, and to-day everything is in its place. The attendance far surpasses our most sanguine anticipations, the number on the ground being estimated at from 35,000 to 40,000 persons.
